biocontainers.name: rnmr
biocontainers.summary: rNMR: open source software for identifying and quantifying metabolites in NMR spectra, developed by the team around Ian A. Lewis (University of Calgary)

biotools.summary: Open source software package for visualizing and interpreting one and two dimensional NMR data.

bioschemas.name: rNMR
bioschemas.summary: Open source software package for visualizing and interpreting one and two dimensional NMR data.
